sentences.en: "I've come to reclaim my property," she announced to the desk clerk.
sentences.cn: “我来要求归还我的房产，”她向接待人员宣布。

sentences.en: Half of the north-west's timber land is public property.
sentences.cn: 西北部的一半林地是公共财产。

sentences.en: He bought an investment property for $100,000 and put down $20,000.
sentences.cn: 他以10万美元买下一处投资性地产，并支付了2万美元的定金。

sentences.en: He can afford to sit out the property slump.
sentences.cn: 他的经济实力可以撑过这次房地产市场萧条期。

sentences.en: Investors can borrow an amount equal to the property's purchase price.
sentences.cn: 投资者可以获得与房产购买价格相等的借款额。

sentences.en: It's too cold to schlepp around looking at property.
sentences.cn: 天太冷，不适合到处去看房子。

sentences.en: Nadja had to fill out forms surrendering all rights to her property.
sentences.cn: 纳佳不得不填表放弃其全部财产所有权。

sentences.en: Property and equities are intimately connected in Hong Kong.
sentences.cn: 在香港，房地产与证券密切关联。

sentences.en: Sid'samazing wealth comes from holdings in oil, gas, land and property.
sentences.cn: 锡德惊人的财富来自他在石油、天然气和房地产领域持有的股份。

sentences.en: Some of the stolen property was found in Mason’s house.
sentences.cn: 在梅森家里找到了部分被盗财物。

sentences.en: The fair market value of the property shot up.
sentences.cn: 这处房产的公平市价增长迅速。

sentences.en: The hotel is not responsible for any loss or damage to guests’ personal property .
sentences.cn: 宾馆对住客个人财物的丢失和损坏概不负责。

sentences.en: The problem was to safeguard sites from encroachment by property development.
sentences.cn: 问题是要保护遗址免受房地产开发商的侵占。

sentences.en: We know them as inaccurate and misleading property descriptions.
sentences.cn: 我们认为对性状的这些描述是不准确的，且会使人产生误解。

sentences.en: Why should they get first call on the best property?
sentences.cn: 凭什么最好的房产尽着他们先挑？

sentences.en: You can't simply wander around squatting on other people's property.
sentences.cn: 你不能这样到处乱窜，擅自占用别人的地产。

sentences.en: You have to take capital appreciation of the property into account.
sentences.cn: 你必须将该处房产的资本增值考虑在内。

words.tran_cn: 有财产的；使用道具的；需要道具的

phrases.tran_cn: n. 商业财产，商用不动产
n. （煤矿的）装备管理员；道具管理人
物业管理；资产管理；物业管理专员
物业管理公司；物业公司
地产市场；房地产市场；物业市场

trans.tran_en: the thing or things that someone owns
